results.title: An adjuvant effect of Metformin as an anti-fibrotic agent when administered with the anti-schistosomal Praziquantel in Schistosoma mansoni infected mice.
results.text_hl: The results showed that @CHEMICAL_Praziquantel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011223 @@@PZQ@@@ had potent worms and egg reduction in liver and intestine tissues with no anti-fibrotic effect of the @<m>DISEASE_Granuloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006099 @@@granuloma@@@ formation. However, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Praziquantel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011223 @@@PZQ@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ treatment postinfection led to a reduction in egg count in both liver and intestine tissues with a significant reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Granuloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006099 @@@granuloma@@@ site.

citations.NLM: Salama WM, El-Naggar SA, Harras SF, El-Said KS. An adjuvant effect of Metformin as an anti-fibrotic agent when administered with the anti-schistosomal Praziquantel in Schistosoma mansoni infected mice. Trop Biomed. 2021 Jun 1;38(2):205-213. PMID: 34172712
